page.title: 13Attitudes
page.content: A 16 year old looks to the future. He has just taken his 'O' levels and has gone back to school to the Sixth Form. He is interested in farming and works at a local farm at week ends. He would like to be a farmer owning his own farm. He does not think this is a probability as he will not be able to afford land and animals and equipment, so he has to decide on another career. He will go in for science and accepts that to get a job in this field he will have to leave the area and this saddens him. He is of Welsh parentage and has been born and bred in the area and attends a Welsh medium secondary school and speaks Welsh fluently. He would like to live in the area when an adult.
